summary: Internal FBI email from the New York Field Office discussing coordination of the Epstein investigation, requesting weekly reports on multiple facets including victim interviews, digital/financial analysis, and public corruption. It references a disturbing victim statement about Epstein's sexual interests and plans for a conference call to coordinate efforts.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' in the email, the central figure of the high-profile investigation involving financial analysis, victim interviews, and potential public corruption.

persons.name: A/SC
persons.context: Briefing the Deputy Assistant Director (DAD) on the Epstein case, indicating high-level internal updates within the FBI.

persons.name: DAD
persons.context: Being briefed by the A/SC on the Epstein case, representing senior FBI management oversight.

connections.description: M is an FBI official involved in overseeing the multi-faceted investigation into Epstein, requiring updates to ensure all fronts are tracked.

events.title: FBI coordination email on Epstein investigation
events.description: Internal FBI email sent outlining the need for weekly reports on the Epstein case, covering victim interviews, digital/financial analysis, forfeiture, public corruption, and significant events like the search of his island.

events.title: Victim interview reveals disturbing Epstein statement
events.description: A victim interviewed stated that Epstein asked her opinion about putting heads of adult females on child bodies and masturbating to the image, which is noted as being relevant for a child pornography affidavit.

events.title: Planned FBI conference call on Epstein case
events.description: A conference call is scheduled for the day after the email to coordinate the investigation, involving checking availability and socializing the inclusion of CEOS/CEOU units.

keyFacts: The FBI was conducting a multi-faceted investigation into Epstein covering victim interviews, digital analysis, financial analysis, forfeiture, and public corruption.
A victim stated that Epstein asked about putting heads of adult females on child bodies and masturbating to the image, which was considered relevant for a child pornography affidavit.
The email instructs the creation of weekly reports to ensure all investigation fronts are tracked and that senior officials are kept comfortable with the progress.
Financial analysis involved reviewing investment accounts and identifying significant payments that coincided with Miami Herald articles.
The email indicates high-level FBI coordination, with the A/SC briefing the DAD and plans to involve specialized units like CEOS/CEOU.
